title: Remembrance
synopsis: Retired Admiral Jean-Luc Picard is drawn back into the world of Starfleet when a mysterious woman in need of help seeks him out.

title: Maps and Legends
synopsis: Picard begins to investigate the mystery of Dahj as well as what her very existence means to the Federation.

title: The End is the Beginning
synopsis: Commodore Oh and Lieutenant Rizzo continue their secret mission while Picard recruits old friends for his journey.

title: Absolute Candor
synopsis: Picard and the crew head to the planet Vashti in search of a Romulan warrior who may join their cause.

title: Stardust City Rag
synopsis: Picard and the crew venture to Freecloud to retrieve Bruce Maddox, but things take a dangerous turn.

title: The Impossible Box
synopsis: Picard and Soji transport to the Artifact, where Picard makes a startling discovery.

title: Nepenthe
synopsis: Picard and Soji seek refuge on the planet Nepenthe, where Picard reunites with old friends.

title: Broken Pieces
synopsis: Picard uncovers the truth about the synthetic conspiracy and the Artifact's role in the events to come.

title: Et in Arcadia Ego, Part 1
synopsis: Picard and the crew finally reach Soji's homeworld, but they are met with unexpected challenges.

title: Et in Arcadia Ego, Part 2
synopsis: Picard and his team face off against a dire threat in a final showdown to save the galaxy.

title: The Star Gazer
synopsis: Picard’s return to Starfleet is complicated when an anomaly in space leads to a confrontation with an old foe.

title: Penance
synopsis: Picard finds himself in a twisted reality where his mission becomes a fight to restore the timeline.

title: Assimilation
synopsis: The crew travels back in time to the year 2024 to stop an event that will alter the future forever.

title: Watcher
synopsis: Picard searches for a mysterious Watcher who can help save the future, while the crew faces new challenges in the past.

title: Fly Me to the Moon
synopsis: Picard encounters an unexpected ally as the crew races against time to prevent a disastrous event.

title: Two of One
synopsis: A high-stakes mission at a gala event brings Picard and his team closer to their goal, but at a significant cost.

title: Monsters
synopsis: Picard confronts dark memories from his past while the crew faces their own personal demons.

title: Mercy
synopsis: Picard and Guinan are interrogated by FBI agents, while the rest of the crew tries to stop a growing threat.

title: Hide and Seek
synopsis: Picard and the crew engage in a deadly game of cat and mouse with their enemies as they attempt to complete their mission.

title: Farewell
synopsis: In the season finale, Picard and the crew face their final battle to save the future and return home.

title: The Next Generation
synopsis: As Picard is reunited with his former crew, a new threat emerges that could change the fate of the galaxy.

title: Disengage
synopsis: Picard and Riker must face the mysterious Vadic, while Raffi uncovers a deadly conspiracy.

title: Seventeen Seconds
synopsis: A life-or-death situation on the Titan forces Picard to face the reality of his past decisions.

title: No Win Scenario
synopsis: The Titan's crew must navigate through dangerous space while Picard reflects on his past choices.

title: Imposters
synopsis: Picard and his allies must confront a startling betrayal that shakes the Federation to its core.

title: The Bounty
synopsis: A race against time ensues as Picard and his team search for a powerful artifact.

title: Dominion
synopsis: Picard and his allies prepare for a final confrontation as they uncover the true nature of their enemy.

title: Surrender
synopsis: With their enemies closing in, Picard and his crew face overwhelming odds in a desperate bid to survive.

title: Võx
synopsis: As the Federation faces its greatest threat, Picard is forced to confront his darkest fears.

title: The Last Generation
synopsis: In the epic series finale, Picard and his former crew engage in a final battle to save the galaxy and ensure the survival of the Federation.
